repo.title: Squarkup Repo
repo.description: Displayed name of the repository, shown in the page `title`.

source.title: Source Directory(s)
source.description: Directory(s) where squarkdown starts searching for files to squarkup, relative to root.

dest.title: Destination Directory
dest.description: Base directory where files are exported relative to.

if-no-dir.title: Nonexistent Directory Handling
if-no-dir.description: Action to take if an export directory does not exist.

exclude.title: Excluded Files
exclude.description: RegEx patterns determining which files to skip squarkup for. These are matched against the entire absolute path of each file.
